summary: REQ-42/43/44 appear implemented: Admin upload form no longer renders a Collection control and applies an internal default; Admin catalog table no longer shows a Collection column; admin UI text in the shown files no longer includes the word "Collection". However, the diff summary indicates multiple additional, unrelated feature changes beyond the BuildRequest scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Removed bilingual label support / introduced English-only label behavior (and/or label language management changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to remove Collection UI from Admin; it did not request changing label language/bilingual support.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (catalogTypes.ts: "removed bilingual label support"; labelLanguage.ts: "Language preference management for bilingual labels")

hallucinated_features.description: Brand/theme and styling overhaul (Maspar brand colors update, glassmorphism utilities, Tailwind token changes, orange gradient header styling).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; requirements are limited to removing Collection UI from Admin and updating Admin text.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes to collections definitions and cleanup/migration logic (e.g., removing Blaize, cleanup of all Blaize items on load).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; non-goal explicitly says not to redesign Public Viewer filtering/organization.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (collections.ts: "Blaize removed"; useCatalog.ts: "cleanup of deprecated seed items and all Blaize collection items")
frontend-file-summaries.txt (seedCatalog.ts: "including Blaize Collection Catalog for cleanup logic")

hallucinated_features.description: Public Viewer feature changes (e.g., label filter dropdown showing thumbnails next to each label option).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and potentially conflicts with the non-goal of not redesigning Public Viewer filtering/organization.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (SearchAndFilters.tsx: "thumbnail images displayed next to each label option")

hallucinated_features.description: Admin area composition changes unrelated to Collection UI (e.g., banner manager in Admin area).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only targets Collection UI removal; adding/altering other admin modules was not requested.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (AdminArea.tsx: "composing the banner manager, upload form, and catalog manager")
